summary: An exterior house east of the New Moon Mill and North of Falkreath. It includes a ship with full interior, and a complete farm,
descriptionHtml:
I have uploaded a new esp. Please download the main file and substitute this esp for the original. It corrects for a navmesh issue at the boat. Companions will now accompany you aboard the boat.

This mod is based on inspiration and assets from Nart2007 and his exterior home mod, \"Whiterun Outskirts Home\". It has all new textures and assets and in no way conflicts with the original, which I highly recommend as a download and addition to your game. You can find that fine home here:

http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/23827

LOCATION:

You can fast travel to the house. It is located east of Half Moon Mill and North of Falkreath on the lake. It consists of a two story exterior home with clear windows on the world. In addition it is a working farm with some new chickens including roosters.
 
A party ship waits at the dock for you, It has a full two level interior.

There is a two level basement. The first level is a display room and includes enchanting and alchemy benches. The lower level is a fancy dorm for your friends and companions.
There is a lot of storage and display available.
 
There are six mannequins.

All crafting is available.
 
This mod makes no pretense at being \"lore correct\". It\'s for fun and pleasure. A place to relax in a rough neighborhood with your companions. The house and all levels, as well as the ship are fully navmeshed and companion friendly.

>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>
Additional Credits:
Clinster74 for weapon racks, alchemy bench, enchanting bench, and display cases. 
>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>
New Plants 1_1 by Tamira
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/22018
>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>
Mighty Joe Young from 1mjytropicalcastle mod
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/18215
>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>
Food Container Resource by Blary http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14133
Book sets Resource by Blary  http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14135
>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>
Spring Flowers for Skyrim by elinin  http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/searchresults/?adv=1&
>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>
Modders Resource Pack by Oaristys   http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/16525 
>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>

In addition to the above are my own many new textures particularly for furniture, floors, walls, ceilings, rugs and vases. 

All my assets are free use without further permission. Please attribute those modders whose assets I have attributed if you use their valuable contributions to this game.

Additional appreciation for Darkone and the sites he supports that bring us all together.

For Tes5Edit with which this mod was cleaned. It should cause no problems.

A special thank you for all the content modders who make their efforts available to the modding community.

To the numerous modders whose contributions continue to inform and inspire.

And finally to a special modding friend, Clinster74, who claims to have once been my student, and from whom I now learn.
author: Bond
